name: Killer LW Open-Source Dynamics Engine
short_description: K_LODE is an Open Source Binding of the ODE Engine to Newtek's LightWave. Provides Hardbody dynamics (SoftBody & Liquid Dynamics coming soon) with Collision Detection.
